data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,940,365 lost people in  Peshawar, N.W.F.P., Pakistan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Peshawar, N.W.F.P., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Peshawar, N.W.F.P., Pakistan to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, you gave the church of Peshawar, N.W.F.P., Pakistan the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Peshawar, N.W.F.P., Pakistan will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, remember the Gabare people. Make the Gabare people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Peshawar, N.W.F.P., Pakistan.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Peshawar, N.W.F.P., Pakistan. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Peshawar, N.W.F.P., Pakistan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
